summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6158 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Buena Vista Addition No. 2, being the alley between 27th Avenue West and 28th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Dravus Street; and certain other streets and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86125, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
